hero.title: Apartment Remodeling & Cleaning Done Right
hero.subtitle: We help property managers and owners transform apartments across the Dallas–Fort Worth area. From full remodels to move-out cleaning — fast, reliable, and professional.

about.title: Built on Hard Work and Trust
about.p1: S & E Realty was founded right here in Dallas, Texas, with a simple mission: deliver high-quality apartment remodeling and cleaning services that property managers can count on.
about.p2: We understand the pressure of turning units fast without cutting corners. Our bilingual team works around your schedule and your tenants' needs. No excuses, no delays — just results.
about.p3: Whether it's a full kitchen remodel, a fresh coat of paint, or a deep clean between tenants, we treat every unit like it's our own.
about.value1Desc: We show up on time, every time. Deadlines aren't suggestions — they're promises.
about.value2Desc: Every job is done to a standard we'd be proud to put our name on.
about.value3Desc: Our team speaks English and Spanish fluently. Clear communication, zero confusion.
about.value4Desc: Based in Dallas, serving the entire DFW metroplex. We know these communities.

services.title: Services Built for Property Managers
services.subtitle: Everything you need to keep your apartments looking great and your tenants happy.
services.remodelingDesc: Full kitchen and bathroom remodels, flooring, fixtures, countertops, and cabinetry. We modernize units to increase rental value and attract quality tenants.
services.cleaningDesc: Deep cleaning between tenants — kitchens, bathrooms, carpets, windows, and appliances. Spotless units, ready for the next move-in.
services.makereadyDesc: Complete unit turn services: patch, paint, clean, and repair. We handle everything so your unit is rent-ready fast.
services.paintingDesc: Interior and exterior painting for individual units or entire complexes. Clean lines, professional finish, fast turnaround.
services.maintenanceDesc: Plumbing, electrical, drywall, doors, locks, and more. We fix what's broken so you don't have to worry about it.

gallery.title: See the Difference
gallery.subtitle: Before and after photos from recent projects across the Dallas–Fort Worth area.
gallery.comingSoon: Photo gallery coming soon. Contact us to see examples of our work.
